attributes.action: Free Prescriptions for those who work
attributes.additional_details:
As many us know the prescription from the NHS cost in the region of £9 per item.

This is diabolical for someone like my partner as an example she has asthma which costs her nearly £36 a month just to breath!

The prescription rises in price year-to-year.

These type of people should not be allowed a free prescriptions therefore working people should not have to pay they bust there guts working  day in day out for what... just to live after bills we have to pay we aren't left with a lot at all. Charging for prescriptions is ridiculous.

It's time to fight for this fight for the small things that will make a huge difference to us all.

To have a dramatic reduction and for it to stay at that price or for it to be abolished would be my aim in this petition.

Please support me with this - TO GET HER WE ARE STRONGER.
